install.title: Installation
install.what: Prerequisites, how to download, keeping up-to-date, alternate versions and methods

services.title: Available Services
services.what: How to best take advantage of local software and services over the Internet

abair.what: Irish synthesized voices available over the Internet

acapela.title: Acapela Group
acapela.what: Many languages available over the Internet

baidu.title: Baidu Translate
baidu.what: Chinese, English, Japanese, Portuguese, and Thai; available over the Internet

collins.title: Collins Dictionary
collins.what: Human pronunciation of most common English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, and Chinese words

duden.title: Duden
duden.what: Online dictionary for German, available over the Internet

ekho.title: Ekho
ekho.what: Korean and several dialects of Chinese, Windows and Linux

espeak.title: eSpeak
espeak.what: Bundled with many built-in languages, Windows and Linux

festival.title: Festival
festival.what: Bundled with English, other languages installable separately, Linux only

fluencynl.title: Fluency.nl
fluencynl.what: Many Dutch voices available over the Internet

google.title: Google Translate
google.what: Many high-quality languages over the Internet

howjsay.title: Howjsay
howjsay.what: High-quality pronunciations of most common English words

imtranslator.title: ImTranslator
imtranslator.what: Asian and European languages, available over the Internet

ispeech.title: iSpeech
ispeech.what: Paid API that offers access to high-quality voices in several languages

linguatec.title: Linguatec
linguatec.what: Many languages available over the Internet

sapi5.title: Microsoft Speech API (SAPI)
sapi5.what: Interface for desktop software to enable TTS playback, built into Windows

naver.title: NAVER Translate
naver.what: Korean, English, Japanese, and Chinese, available over the Internet

neospeech.title: NeoSpeech
neospeech.what: English, Spanish, French, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean, available over the Internet

oddcast.title: Oddcast
oddcast.what: Many languages available over the Internet

say.title: OS X Speech Synthesis Manager
say.what: Many languages installable through System Preferences, built into Mac OS X

oxford.title: Oxford Dictionary
oxford.what: British and American English, available over the Internet

rhvoice.title: RHVoice
rhvoice.what: Russian, Georgian, English, and Esperanto; Linux natively or Windows via SAPI

spanishdict.title: SpanishDict
spanishdict.what: English and Spanish speech, available over the Internet

pico2wave.title: SVOX Pico
pico2wave.what: Voice synthesizer used in the Android operating system

ttsapicom.title: TTS-API.com
ttsapicom.what: Discontinued service that formerly offered English via the Internet

voicetext.title: VoiceText
voicetext.what: Japanese speech in multiple voices, available over the Internet

yandex.title: Yandex.Translate
yandex.what: Russian and many European languages, available over the Internet

youdao.title: Youdao Dictionary
youdao.what: British and American English, available over the Internet

usage.title: Using the Add-on
usage.what: Enable on-the-fly playback, mass generate audio files, or add as you go

editor.title: Storing MP3 Audio Files from the Note Editor
editor.what: Generate audio as you add or edit a note, files stored with collection

browser.title: Storing MP3 Audio Files from the Card Browser
browser.what: Mass generate audio for many cards at once, files stored with collection

on-the-fly.title: Enabling On-the-Fly Playback via Card Templates
on-the-fly.what: Quickly enable audio via your card templates, with no file synchronization

presets.title: Managing Service Presets and Speaking Selected Text
presets.what: Save a particular service configuration, then use it later for playback/recording

groups.title: Playback and Recording w/ Groups of Service Presets
groups.what: Create a list of different service configurations, then use it for randomized or first-success-wins playback/recording

removing.title: Removing Audio via the Card Browser
removing.what: Remove [sound] tags or AwesomeTTS audio filenames for many cards at once

config.title: Configuration and Tweaking
config.what: Set automatic playback, shortcut keys, text handling, MP3 generation, and more

playback.title: Playback Configuration
playback.what: Set shortcut keys, enable or disable automatic playback, set automatic playback delays

text.title: Text and Cloze Deletion Configuration
text.what: Ignore certain text in playback or recording, tweak cloze deletion handling

mp3s.title: MP3 Generation Configuration
mp3s.what: Tune how the LAME transcoder gets called, control download rate limiting

windows.title: Window Configuration
windows.what: Change the shortcut keys used to open windows

advanced.title: Advanced Configuration
advanced.what: Setup presets and groups, check for updates, manage your cache

contribute.title: Contributing to Development
contribute.what: Report bugs, suggest features, submit code, test unreleased versions, rate us
